dosing.text: 40 mg subcutaneously every other week.

≥30 kg (66 lbs): 40 mg subcutaneously every other week.

Maintenance Dose: 40 mg subcutaneously every other week starting one week after initial dose.

Antipsoriatic Agents - MC Antibody, Human Interleukin 12/23 Inhibitors

dosing.text: Initial dose (Day 1): 160 mg (four 40 mg injections in one day or two 40 mg injections per day for two consecutive days).
Second dose two weeks later (Day 15): 80 mg
Two weeks later (Day 29): Begin a maintenance dose of 40 mg every other week.

instructions.instruction: For patients with Ulcerative Colitis only: Only continue HUMIRA in patients who have shown evidence of clinical remission by eight weeks (Day 57) of therapy.

qlimit.initPerIntervalDesc: 1 starter pack for the first 28 days only
6 pens per 28 days for the first 4 weeks
6 kits per 28 days for the first 4 weeks

dosing.text: Initial dose (Day 1): 160 mg (four 40 mg injections in one day or two 40 mg injections per day for two consecutive days).
Second dose two weeks later (Day 15): 80 mg
Two weeks later (Day 29): Begin a maintenance dose of 40 mg every other week.
Note: Some patients may require a maintenance dose of 40 mg every week

6 pens per 28 days for the first 4 weeks

Thomson ABR, Gupta M, Freeman HJ. Use of the tumor necrosis factor-blockers for Crohn's disease. World J Gastroenterol. 2012; 18: 4823-54. doi:10.3748/wjg.v18.i35.4823

treatmentLine.selectedListName: Crohns Disease - Aminosalicylates and Related Agents

DMARD - Antinflammatory, Select. costimulation modulator,T-cell Inhib.
Antipsoriatic Agents - MC Antibody, Human Interleukin 12/23 Inhibitors

dosing.text: Initial dose for members 17 kg (37 lbs) to < 40 kg (88 lbs): 80 mg (two 40 mg injections in one day)
Second dose two weeks later (Day 15) for members 17 kg (37 lbs) to < 40 kg (88 lbs): 40 mg
Maintence dose two weeks later (Day 29) for members 17 kg (37 lbs) to < 40 kg (88 lbs): 20 mg every other week.
Initial dose for members ≥ 40 kg (88 lbs): 160 mg (four 40 mg injections in one day or two 40 mg injections per day for two consecutive days)
Second dose two weeks later (Day 15) for members ≥ 40 kg (88 lbs): 80 mg (two 40 mg injections in one day)
Maintence dose two weeks later (Day 29) for members ≥ 40 kg (88 lbs): 40 mg every other week.

qlimit.initPerIntervalDesc: 1 starter pack for the first 28 days only
6 pens per 28 days for the first 4 weeks
6 kits per 28 days for the first 4 weeks
2 pens per 28 days
